summary:
A motivational speaker who hosted several events and conferences. Also the founder of “ Gharna Halabi ” for selling traditional, natural, and organic products with handcraft designs.

Aside of being a writer and researcher, I am a community and communication coordinator managing all social media content with NGOs to engage with the targeted audience and partners by following all the programmes and tasks to leave a positive impact and to create a professional network.

A project coordinator who manged two projects related to the Tech sector with professional international organizations.

A short documentary maker, having recorded two short documentaries: “Voices Under Pressure” and “Grass on a Stone”. 

Have a positive problem solving attitude with attention to details, proven success and leadership record in more than 13 years of working in different fields.

Humbly chosen to meet her majesty, Maxima the Queen of the Netherlands, nominated by Stichting SPARK organization.

Multi-task, business and communications, graduated with honor (GPA: 3.33) from the Lebanese International University in Beirut, Communication of Arts, Radio and TV.

profile_positions.description:
Gharna Halabi is an online Shop launched in 2018, caters to a number of services and products and offers the number one natural soap recognized all over the world.

 
Gharna Halabi offers many other traditional, organic and chemical-free health care products that are handmade, handcrafted and offered as a special solution, not only for the pandemic response but also for the majority of the people who have skin and hair problems.
profile_positions.title: Founder

profile_positions.description:
The Taleb Educational Platform is a leading Syrian digital platform, established in 2023, that adopts the best tools and global standards of digital education to present them to students seeking success and excellence.

We offer a wide array of educational materials created by the best teachers and specialists, in addition to evaluative tests and educational supervision for each student. All these services are integrated with the best digital solutions, which form a strong support to the traditional educational process and complement it.

Our mission  is to remove all obstacles and challenges facing our students and provide them with all the necessary means to achieve the desired success in their educational journey.
profile_positions.title: Director of Communications

profile_positions.description: Meetingselect is the global meeting management platform to book small to complex meetings worldwide.
profile_positions.title: Billing Specialist

profile_positions.description:
DEP is a seed stage entrepreneurship program that aims to introduce start-up entrepreneurs and those with creative ideas to understand the terminology related to entrepreneurship.

Was a great opportunity to become the Arabic version trainer to lead those newcomers across the region to understand the journey of entrepreneurship.
profile_positions.title: Team Facilitator

profile_positions.description:
Working in a very positive environment such as Techfugees leaded me to find myself as a communication coordintator presenting Techfugees to the other international and local organization.

I achieved builing a strong network with many other professional organization such as SPARK, SWB, Injaz, Migration Jam, and more.

Besides being the organizer of the live steaming, I worked to increase our community by giving them the space to contact high profile advisors in many different fields such as Karim Semmakie, Alexandra Kabujian, Anas Chalabi, and others.

This initiative helped me to develop my communications skills like, organizing and planning events, meetings, builing a professional network, presenting and matching, and creating new partners connections.
profile_positions.title: Communications Coordinator Volunteer

profile_positions.description:
I started this role in 2019, once I applied to become a volunteer with Techfugees Lebanon. 
I achieved increasing our 
community from 27 member to +1K, as I worked on creating and sharing activities on our pages on the social media, writing and publishing reports and articles on our website, preparing and organizing all our livestreaming meetups and sessions, and building a professional network with other NGOs.

This opportunity led me to develop my digital skills such as, wiriting, editing, making desings, creating data base, getting familiar with all the needed tools such as creating a social media plan, targeting our audience, building community, and more.
profile_positions.title: Communications Coordinator

profile_positions.description:
succeded with launching our first program at techfugees, the Job Readiness Springboard in partnership with Techfugees Canada, Anera, Na'amal, and HiTL, funded by Western Union.
The main objective of this program is to support displaced people in the basics skills for working remotely, such as English langauge, IT skills, soft skills, data annotation, and data labeling, besides offering scholarships from google to each participant.
we achieved train 30 trainees and linked them to our partner, to get their first paid project in Data Annotation with HiTL as Data Annotators, besides an internship opportunities that are related to the google course that have been chosen by their interests.
I achieved a high level of management skills such as, working under pressure, problem sloving, team player, self starter, organizing, reporting and evaluating, networking for sharing knowledge in a professional setting, creating new business connections, and more professional skills that helped me to developing my management represetative skills.
profile_positions.title: Project Coordinator

profile_positions.description: Making short documentaries, I've done 2 Documentaries, "Voices Under Pressure", "Grass on a Stone", and now working on "Ashes" Script.
profile_positions.title: Documentary Filmmaker

profile_positions.description: Reporter and Journalist, covered and reported several events, news and interviews during the last 10 years as an articles writer, my works shown in, Al-Khabar TS, Al-Akhbar newspaper, Al-Fanar Media, Techfugees and more.
profile_positions.title: Reporter and Articles Writer

profile_positions.description:
I worked as a freelancer project coordinator with HiTL for 2 projects, an Avatar Making project, and data annotation in partnership with Techfugees. I achieved deliever the requested data in high quality with low budget as my responsibility was to make sure of the 3 stages of the first level of the project, pre-production, production, and after production.
working with a great organization such as HiTL helped me developing my management skills, such as, time and budget management, data driven, orgainizing and planning, developing processes, and reporting.
profile_positions.title: Project Coordinator
SPARK Alumni Network Board of Members

profile_positions.description:
Hosted Spark’s conference “Bridging the Gap” on March 26th2018 at the American University of Beirut, AUB, which supported by the European Union, hosted high profile officials such as the Lebanese Minister of Education and, higher education, as well as Dutch Ambassador of Lebanon.
Hosted several of Spark’s Event as a Motivation Speaker for Spark’s new students, sharing my educational experience and self-effort like the "Welcome Day in AUST" and the"Gradutaion's Ceremony" in BDD, and many other Events.
profile_positions.title: Motivational and Public Speaker

volunteer_experiences.description: Covered the visit of the queen of Sweden, Her Majesty Sylvia, for Beirut, as a photographer, Videographer, and Video editor.

volunteer_experiences.role: Communications and Programs Coordinator - Lebanon Chapter
volunteer_experiences.description:
Launched a series of virtual streaming with professional people about the new normal during the lockdown.
Established a strong community with youth to empower them by giving them some motivational examples, link them with potential partners, courses, and job opportunities.
Established global communications with potential partners.

Working on building community, as well as keep a good relationship with potentional partners. 
Translating all the organization captions, posts, articles, press and mails.
Helping with moderating the online courses.

Covered "So Can She" Event in 2019.
Helped with organizing the virtual event "Diary of U" in 2020.

https://m.facebook.com/JCILebanon/videos/408816979725996/

Provided expert opinion on the selection of projects and evaluated eight shortlisted proposals on 
projects that aimed to support completion of higher and further education for Syrian students and 
vulnerable Lebanese Youth.
Planning for the global content for 2021 World Refugee Day.
